step.datasource:
SELECT _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager.ID as freeguidfield_01, _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager.Approver as Emp_id, Fullname + ' ' + 'is afwezig' as description , _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager.StartDate AS StartDate , _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager.EndDate AS EndDate , '1200' as Type FROM _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager left outer join
(Select hid, empID, freeguidField_01, id, startdate, enddate, type from Absences with(nolock) where type = '1200' and freeguidfield_01 is not null ) c on _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager.approver = c.EmpID and _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager.id = c.FreeGuidField_01 and _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager.startdate = c.startdate and _AB_Verlofregistratie_agenda_manager.enddate = c.enddate
where c.id is null
